glob_t Struct Reference
[glob() API]

#include <glob.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Result structure for glob().

This structure is used by glob() to return the results of the search.

Public Attributes

int gl_pathc
int gl_matchc
int gl_offs
int gl_flags
char ** gl_pathv

Member Data Documentation

int gl_pathc

count of total paths so far

Referenced by glob(), and globfree().

int gl_matchc

count of paths matching pattern

Referenced by glob().

int gl_offs

reserved at beginning of gl_pathv

Referenced by glob().

int gl_flags

returned flags

Referenced by glob().

char** gl_pathv

list of paths matching pattern

Referenced by glob(), and globfree().
